snippet.title: Raygun Gadabout Kickstarter Trailer
snippet.description:
BLAST YOUR WAY ACROSS THE GALAXY

Freely explore a strange galaxy teeming with danger and wonder. Befriend helpful aliens, solve puzzles and equip new abilities. Battle evil space pirates and liberate the galaxy from the clutches of the Space Gopher Empire. Grab your raygun and board your ship. You are the RAYGUN GADABOUT!

Coming to Kickstarter on April 3rd!

KICKSTARTER: https://goo.gl/HTkyXn
STEAM: http://store.steampowered.com/app/757940/Raygun_Gadabout/
